构造方法详细信息

BytesInputStream

public BytesInputStream(byte[] buf,
                        CodecConfig codecConfig)
方法详细信息

available

public int available()
Returns the number of remaining bytes that can be read (or skipped over) from this input stream.

The value returned is count - pos + offsetStart, which is the number of bytes remaining to be read from the input buffer.

覆盖：
类 java.io.InputStream 中的 available
返回：
the number of remaining bytes that can be read (or skipped over) from this input stream without blocking.

getCount

public int getCount()

position

public int position()

read

public int read()
Reads the next byte of data from this input stream. The value byte is returned as an int in the range 0 to 255. If no byte is available because the end of the stream has been reached, the value -1 is returned.

This read method cannot block.

指定者：
类 java.io.InputStream 中的 read
返回：
the next byte of data, or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached.
